detailed_profile.name: Wanshdeep Singh
detailed_profile.position: EY Luxembourg | Assurance Senior | Wealth & Asset Management & Other Assurance
detailed_profile.about: As a Senior at EY Luxembourg in the Systems and Organizational Controls Reporting Team, I play a pivotal role in ensuring the integrity and efficiency of client organizational systems and internal controls. My responsibilities include evaluating and testing business processes, identifying potential control gaps, and advising clients on implementing improvements and solutions. In conducting rigorous audits, my work provides vital assurance on internal controls to stakeholders. My role involves collaborating with client teams across various sectors, enabling me to develop a comprehensive understanding of diverse business models and industries. This broad exposure has honed my problem-solving abilities and has fostered my adaptability, enabling me to tackle complex challenges effectively. Furthermore, my commitment to continuous learning has equipped me with up-to-date knowledge on relevant standards and regulations, including SOC 1, ISAE 3000 and ISAE 3402. This expertise aids me in navigating evolving compliance landscapes and providing high-quality client service. In demonstrating strong professional ethics, keen attention to detail and excellent communication skills, I have made substantial contributions to my team and have consistently achieved successful outcomes for our clients. As I continue to grow within EY, I am eager to leverage my strengths to handle larger responsibilities, drive team success, and deliver value to our clients. EY is a global leader in assurance, tax, transaction and advisory services. The insights and quality services we deliver help build trust and confidence in the capital markets and in economies the world over.

positions.subtitle: PhonePe
positions.description: Reignited and reinvented the App-in-App vertical (Switch) through Strategic Partnerships that unlocked a new revenue stream for the Consumer Payments Division.Identified, negotiated and steered a multi-million dollar deal for a 3 year period and successfully launched the PhonePe Travel Category. A whitelisted entry point for the consumers on the PhonePe App to access India's top OTA's in a single Super App. Improved the Engagement Metrics for PhonePe with the added features of Flight, Bus, Train & Hotel Bookings routed through MakeMyTrip, RedBus & ConfirmTkt (Ixigo).Led the GTM strategy & Product development for the partners through segmented CRM, PhonePe Ads and improved UX journey to help acquire ~40% New Customers on their MAC metrics.Grew the GMV by 15% month over month with a 25% increment in bookings for the partners.Managed 14 Categories (Food, Metro, Gaming, Pharmacy etc.) and 650+ partners within the different categories and pivoted to the Exclusivity Business Model in various categories.
positions.title: Growth & Revenue Manager - Switch
positions.description_html:
Reignited and reinvented the App-in-App vertical (Switch) through Strategic Partnerships that unlocked a new revenue stream for the Consumer Payments Division.

Identified, negotiated and steered a multi-million dollar deal for a 3 year period and successfully launched the PhonePe Travel Category. A whitelisted entry point for the consumers on the PhonePe App to access India's top OTA's in a single Super App.

Improved the Engagement Metrics for PhonePe with the added features of Flight, Bus, Train & Hotel Bookings routed through MakeMyTrip, RedBus & ConfirmTkt (Ixigo).

Led the GTM strategy & Product development for the partners through segmented CRM, PhonePe Ads and improved UX journey to help acquire ~40% New Customers on their MAC metrics.

Grew the GMV by 15% month over month with a 25% increment in bookings for the partners.

Managed 14 Categories (Food, Metro, Gaming, Pharmacy etc.) and 650+ partners within the different categories and pivoted to the Exclusivity Business Model in various categories.

Acquisition of identified National/ Strategic accounts by reaching the CXO's and decision makers of the client partner.2. Account Management of these accounts on a daily basis with top level management of the partner.3. Driving Growth objectives and strengthening the partnerships through regular Weekly and Monthly reviews with the Retail, Marketing & Finance heads.4. Introducing new ways of driving Merchant objectives through different PhonePe solutions like Rewarding Scratch Cards & PhonePe Switch platform.Highlights:1. Acquired the highest number of accounts (10) amongst my peers in the half yearly review at the end of December 2019.2. Acquired & assisted in some of the top Strategic Accounts like Titan Group, Puma, Manipal Hospitals, Soch, Wildcraft & Marriott Group.3. Realigned, reactivated & renegotiated with prominent accounts like Sangeetha Mobiles, Health & Glow, Pai International & Absolute Barbecues for restarting our association.
positions.title: Enterprise Manager - Enterprise Accounts
positions.description_html:
As an Enterprise Manager, I was handling the South Zone in establishing partnerships with the Enterprise Accounts (National & Strategic) across the industries. Some of the key partnerships that I established and managed included Titan Group, Manipal Hospitals, Himalaya Drug Company, Puma and 40 other top tier accounts.

Roles & Responsibilities:

1. Acquisition of identified National/ Strategic accounts by reaching the CXO's and decision makers of the client partner.
2. Account Management of these accounts on a daily basis with top level management of the partner.
3. Driving Growth objectives and strengthening the partnerships through regular Weekly and Monthly reviews with the Retail, Marketing & Finance heads.
4. Introducing new ways of driving Merchant objectives through different PhonePe solutions like Rewarding Scratch Cards & PhonePe Switch platform.

Highlights:

1. Acquired the highest number of accounts (10) amongst my peers in the half yearly review at the end of December 2019.
2. Acquired & assisted in some of the top Strategic Accounts like Titan Group, Puma, Manipal Hospitals, Soch, Wildcraft & Marriott Group.
3. Realigned, reactivated & renegotiated with prominent accounts like Sangeetha Mobiles, Health & Glow, Pai International & Absolute Barbecues for restarting our association.

positions.subtitle: PhonePe
positions.description: Established and worked as a Launch Desk Manager for Enterprise Accounts for a period of 6 months. I was centrally located and handled the Operational Tasks of Compliance, On-boarding, Roll Out and Servicing of existing accounts in the Enterprise team. Launched multiple national/ strategic accounts across India like Vishal Mega Mart, Smaaash, Fab India and 20 others. I also handled the on-boarding and roll out of our aggregator, Pine Labs. Roles & Responsibilities:1. Enterprise Account On-boarding as per compliance on Salesforce.2. Planning the Roll Out of the PhonePe solution at the PAN India stores in a phase wise manner.3. Dashboard and Accounting Training for the client, CFO & Retail Head.4. Regular Service Management and collateral deployment at the stores during Offer periods.5. Handling everyday accounting queries and service related issues.Highlights:1. Handled both the roles of Enterprise Manager & Launch Desk Manager effectively and with success.2. Created and established the Launch Desk from the scratch.3. Launched 41 accounts at a run rate of around 8 accounts per month, 2x of the earlier run rate (4).4. The successful establishment of Launch Desk, has allowed the team to now focus on the value it adds post the BD closure till the account management.
positions.title: Launch Desk Manager - Enterprise Accounts
positions.description_html:
Established and worked as a Launch Desk Manager for Enterprise Accounts for a period of 6 months. I was centrally located and handled the Operational Tasks of Compliance, On-boarding, Roll Out and Servicing of existing accounts in the Enterprise team.

Launched multiple national/ strategic accounts across India like Vishal Mega Mart, Smaaash, Fab India and 20 others. I also handled the on-boarding and roll out of our aggregator, Pine Labs.

Roles & Responsibilities:

1. Enterprise Account On-boarding as per compliance on Salesforce.
2. Planning the Roll Out of the PhonePe solution at the PAN India stores in a phase wise manner.
3. Dashboard and Accounting Training for the client, CFO & Retail Head.
4. Regular Service Management and collateral deployment at the stores during Offer periods.
5. Handling everyday accounting queries and service related issues.

Highlights:

1. Handled both the roles of Enterprise Manager & Launch Desk Manager effectively and with success.
2. Created and established the Launch Desk from the scratch.
3. Launched 41 accounts at a run rate of around 8 accounts per month, 2x of the earlier run rate (4).
4. The successful establishment of Launch Desk, has allowed the team to now focus on the value it adds post the BD closure till the account management.

recommendations: Dr. Pratima verma “Saurabh—words fall short when it comes to describing him. An outstanding student with an insatiable desire to learn, he consistently met deadlines and always pushed himself to go above and beyond the expected. Anyone who has the opportunity to work with him will not only be impressed but genuinely grateful.”

Evan Fabio “I worked for Saurabh last year. A lot have been said about his excellent knowledge and skills, but what I'd like to talk about him as a leader and a human being. Saurabh has that kind of charisma and empathy that makes me want to give my best every time I step into the office. He is the kind of leader that you can trust since day 0, the one that always has your back in whatever situation that may arise. Saurabh was always the first person to give credit publicly, but he also never hesitated about giving constructive feedback privately. I don't really give recommendation to others, but Saurabh is an exception. Any company would be lucky to have his presence in the office, given that you can endure his unique sense of humor every now and then.”

basic_info.name: Nikshubha Kumar – Data Scientist, Rystad Energy
basic_info.search_snippet: A data scientist, currently based in Norway and looking to take the next step in the Netherlands. I've worked on everything from building LLM-powered chatbots.

detailed_profile.name: Nikshubha Kumar
detailed_profile.about: A data scientist, currently based in Norway and looking to take the next step in the Netherlands. I’ve worked on everything from building LLM-powered chatbots with hybrid retrieval pipelines to extracting insights from AIS data. I’m especially drawn to projects that merge machine learning with real-world impact. Whether it’s developing RAG systems, fine-tuning LLMs, or digging into energy logistics data, I love turning complexity into clarity — and being part of collaborative teams.

detailed_profile.position: Senior Technical Product Manager @ Amazon | Bachelors in computer science engineering | Masters in general management
detailed_profile.about: With a tenure at Amazon focused on EU VAT transaction reporting and developer experience, my career is marked by a dedication to process improvement and customer relationship management. The role as Senior Product Manager has honed my skills in agile project management, ensuring regulatory compliance, and fostering strong customer relationships. Our team's efforts in streamlining the application ingestion for Amazon's key product lines have resulted in enhanced developer and customer experiences. In collaboration with my colleagues, we have successfully navigated the complexities of VAT regulations in the EU, reinforcing Amazon's commitment to compliance and operational excellence.

detailed_profile.name: Pawan Kumar
detailed_profile.about: Hi, Welcome to my LinkedIn profile! I am a passionate and results-driven finance professional with a strong academic background in Finance and a keen interest in financial analysis and risk management. As a recent Creative Finance graduate, I possess exceptional analytical and abstract reasoning skills, which, coupled with my internship experiences, have equipped me with the ability to navigate complex financial landscapes with precision and insight. My journey in Finance began with an MBA Degree in Finance and Marketing at I.K. Gujral Punjab Technical University, earning the prestigious Chief Minister Scholarship and graduating with distinction. Building on this foundation, I pursued Economist in Finance program from Budapest University of Technology and Economics, where I achieved outstanding academic performance and was honored with the Student Excellence Award. During my internships at CitiBank Hungary and Freeway Entertainment, I had the privilege of working with talented finance teams and contributing to essential financial reporting and analysis projects. These experiences not only refined my financial acumen but also fostered a keen eye for detail and a focus on process optimization to drive efficiency and accuracy. I am proficient in utilizing various tools, including MS Office (MS Excel) applications and possess a academic understanding of SQL and Python, which enhances my ability to extract valuable insights from data. With excellent communication skills and a strong emotional intelligence, I thrive in collaborative environments and contribute to fostering a positive and cohesive team culture. Outside of my professional pursuits, I am deeply committed to continuous learning and staying updated on industry trends, particularly in sustainable finance and environmental conservation. Engaging in yoga, meditation, and exploring new destinations through travel also keeps me energized and inspired. My ambition is to further develop my career as a Financial/Data/Risk Analyst, bringing my unique blend of analytical rigor, innovative thinking, and adaptability to a forward-thinking multinational firm. Currently, I amalso working towards achieving certifications as a Financial Risk Manager (FRM) and Chartered Financial Analyst (CFA) to deepen my expertise and add value to the organizations I serve. I am open to new opportunities and connections with like-minded professionals who share a passion for finance, sustainability, and making a positive impact in the world of finance. Let's connect and explore potential synergies! Feel free to reach out,

publications.title: Inclusive green finance: as an approach of developing a comprehensive indicator for BRICS and other emerging economies
publications.subtitle: Springer Open
publications.description: While a large body of literature has provided evidence on how financial development can contribute to the increase in well-being and, more recently, to the quality of the environment, it remains under researched how emerging markets’ performance can be assessed in the two fields simultaneously. The study introduces a novel approach to assessing IGF, using BRICS and four Central European economies as examples to reveal key trends and performance metrics. It evaluates the financial structure of selected economies using World Bank and IMF data sets on financial inclusion, alongside indicators of green finance and innovation. The bunch of data are analysed with the help of three sub-indices contrasting the methodology of the HDI and the positivity constrained version of the two-stage PCA to reach a more stable and consistent evaluation. We find that though the ranking of emerging economies largely depends on the selection of the data set, the composite indicator based on the two-stage PCA provides more balanced results. Overall, the composite indicator developed in this study equips policymakers and international organisations with a practical tool to track progress in financial inclusion and green finance, enabling cross-country comparisons and timely interventions.

projects.title: Investment Funds: Fuelling Economic Development of Hungary
projects.description: This paper has been selected in top 20 national papers by Magyar Nemezeti Bank and MNB Institute under "A Century of Economic Revolutions Study Competition 2024". AbstractThis paper examines the role of investment funds in Hungary's economic development, highlighting their growth, diversification, and impact on the financial landscape. Since their inception in 1992, investment funds in Hungary have evolved significantly, contributing to 20% of the country's GDP by the end of 2021. The study traces the development from initial closed-end funds focused on domestic securities to a diversified portfolio that includes real estate, sovereign debt, bond, and equity funds. Key shifts in asset allocation from 2010 to 2021 are noted, with a decline in money market and guaranteed funds and a surge in real estate and mixed funds. The paper underscores the importance of investment funds as unique financial intermediaries, actively managing assets and influencing market transactions. Detailed financial data reflects the sector's profitability and resilience, despite temporary setbacks from the European debt crisis and the COVID-19 pandemic. The study concludes that investment funds are crucial drivers of Hungary's economic growth, showcasing robust investor confidence and continuous asset growth, cementing their role in the nation's financial stability and progress.

projects.title: Financial Data Analysis of a Bank's personal loan customers segment
projects.description: Data Description: The file Bank.xls contains data on 5000 customers. The data include customer demographic information (age, income, etc.), the customer's relationship with the bank (mortgage, securities account, etc.), and the customer response to the last personal loan campaign (Personal Loan). Among these 5000 customers, only 480 (= 9.6%) accepted the personal loan that was offered to them in the earlier campaign.Context: This case is about a bank (Thera Bank) whose management wants to explore ways of converting its liability customers to personal loan customers (while retaining them as depositors). A campaign that the bank ran last year for liability customers showed a healthy conversion rate of over 9% success. This has encouraged the retail marketing department to devise campaigns with better target marketing to increase the success ratio with minimal budget.

detailed_profile.name: Divya Berlia
detailed_profile.position: 🌟 Passionate Sales Leader | Driving Revenue Growth & Client Success 🌟 👔 Sales Manager | Business Development | Key Account Management | SaaS, B2B and B2C 🚀 Elevating Sales Performance to New Heights
detailed_profile.about: As a seasoned Sales Manager, I am dedicated to creating and implementing strategic sales initiatives that fuel revenue growth and foster lasting client relationships. With a proven track record of success in driving sales teams to exceed targets, I bring a dynamic approach to achieving and surpassing organizational goals. 🔍 Key Strengths: ✅ Strategic Planning: Orchestrating comprehensive sales strategies to penetrate new markets, expand client bases, and boost overall profitability. ✅ Team Leadership: Inspiring and leading high-performing sales teams through coaching, mentorship, and a collaborative approach to achieve peak performance. ✅ Client Relationship Management: Building and nurturing strong, trust-based relationships with key clients, ensuring long-term satisfaction and loyalty. ✅ Data-Driven Decision Making: Leveraging analytics and market insights to make informed decisions, optimize processes, and maximize sales effectiveness. 🌐 Industry Expertise: My experience spans in Real Estate, E-learning and Recruitment, where I have successfully navigated dynamic market landscapes and consistently delivered results. Whether it's crafting compelling value propositions or negotiating complex deals, I thrive on the challenges of the sales arena. 📈 Recent Achievements: 🏆 Achieved a 150% increase in annual sales revenue through the implementation of targeted sales strategies. 🌐 Expanded market share by successfully launching and promoting new products/services. 🤝 Fostered strategic partnerships resulting in mutually beneficial business opportunities. 🔗 Let's Connect: I am always open to connecting with professionals who share a passion for sales excellence, business growth, and client satisfaction. Let's explore synergies and opportunities together. 📧 Email: divya.berlia@gmail.com ☎️ Phone: 9930931409 🌐 LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/in/divyaberlia #SalesManagement #TalentAcquisition #BusinessDevelopment #CustomerService #Leadership #TeamManagement

experience.title: Senior Team Lead
experience.description: - Providing leadership and direction to the Inbound sales team, including setting goals, monitoring performance, and fostering a collaborative and high-performance culture. - Developing and executing a comprehensive sales strategy that supports the company's growth objectives and enhances its competitive position in the market. - Lead negotiations with potential merchants to secure favorable terms and agreements that align with company goals and objectives. - Collaborate closely with internal teams, including marketing, product, and finance to align sales initiatives with overall business objectives and priorities. - Develop and implement metrics and KPIs to track the performance and impact of outbound sales initiatives, and regularly report on progress to senior leadership.

- Collaborate closely with internal teams, including marketing, product, and finance to align sales initiatives with overall business objectives and priorities.

- Develop and implement metrics and KPIs to track the performance and impact of outbound sales initiatives, and regularly report on progress to senior leadership.
